alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Mainland Hyde; Tyrrell; Washington (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 1:21PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Washington, northwestern Hyde, northeastern Beaufort and northwestern Tyrrell Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 120 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Belhaven, or 18 miles east of River Road, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Belhaven, Ponzer, Pungo, Woodley, Pike Road, Wenona, Sidney Crossroads, Pleasant Grove, Scuppernong, Yeatesville, Phelps Lake, Pungo Lake, Mackeys, Roper, Sydney Crossroads, Creswell and Pantego. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EDT for eastern North Carolina.
